attributes.action: Remove John Bercow from his position as speaker of the house. He is a hypocrite.
attributes.background: John Berco recently expressed his unwillingness to welcome President Trump and address parliament, this is totally inappropriate and unimpartial. He has in the past welcomed with open arms other leaders with bad records of torture,abuse,sexual inequality and total disregard for him rights i.e China.

rejection.details:
There is no mechanism for the removal of a Speaker during a Parliament. Other than at a general election, the Speaker can only stop being Speaker through resignation or death.

If you like, you could sign the petition below, which asks the House of Commons to debate a vote of no confidence in the Speaker:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183279
